nodes.text: Star Wars: The Last Jedi: Ultimate Sticker Collection

Star Wars: The Last Jedi: Ultimate Sticker Collection is a children's activity book based on the sequel trilogy film Star Wars: The Last Jedi. It was written by David Fentiman and published by Dorling Kindersley on December 15, 2017.
This 72-page sticker book includes more than 1,000 stickers of main characters, locations, vehicles and props. Featuring all-new content from the highly anticipated film, Star Wars: The Last Jedi!
